item.title: Juliette Binoche Reveals Robert Redford Told Her to Make a Film About Dance Show ‘In-I’: “He Repeated It With a Lot of Passion”
item.description: The French Oscar winner was also asked about her support for Palestine as she prepares to premiere her directorial debut at the 73rd San Sebastian Film Festival.

item.title: Edward Berger’s ‘Ballad of a Small Player,’ Rami Malek and Russell Crowe-Starring ‘Nuremberg’ Join San Sebastian Film Festival Lineup
item.description: French actress Juliette Binoche will also present her directorial debut at this year’s San Sebastian Film Festival, running Sep. 19-27.
